item.title: Create & Publish a Github Pages website - Guide
item.description: Authored by AH License Notice This article is published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license. Table of Contents Introduction 0. Pre-preparation reading 1. Login onto GitHub 2. Creating a repository for the site 3. Creating the test site 4. Uploading your website files and folders Â Introduction This guide intends to provide a step-by-step guide with pictures of how to publish a GitHub Pages website and create the corresponding repository for it.
